result.html: An bhfuil ceol agat féinAre you musical yourself?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil ceol agat féinAre you musical yourself?

result.html: An bhfuil ceol agatsaAre you musical?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil ceol agatsaAre you musical?

result.eng: I'm not musical at all, alas!
result.ga: Níl ceol ar bith agam faraor
result.orig: Níl ceol ar bith agam faraor

result.ponchtml: Níl ceol ar biṫ agam faraorI'm not musical at all, alas!
